file.description: Filename. Can contain a regexp or glob expression

fields.title: List of columns to use
fields.description: List of columns to use for extract

delimiter.description: Delimiter to use for splitting the csv records

batch_size.description: Number of records to read per batch

use_header.description: Determines whether or not to use the first line as the header containing column names. If `false`, field names must be specified

quotechar.description: A one-character string used to quote fields containing special characters, such as the delimiter or quotechar, or which contain new-line characters. It defaults to '
